title: SUDO Password
summary: The SUDO password is the super user password. Similar to the Administrator account on windows. It is needed to install anything that uses or changes the secure part of the system.

title: SD Cards
summary: Depending on the model you have the Steam Deck doesnâ€™t have a lot of storage space. Even the 512gb version will fill up fast with AAA games. Upgrading the internal storage and adding an SD Card will increase your storage space.

title: Decky Loader
summary: Decky Loader is a program for installing 3rd party plugins into Game Mode. There is a lot of QOL and customization plugins available.

title: Plugin: CSS Loader
summary: CSS Loader is a Decky Loader plugin to customize the theme and layout of your Game Mode Library.

title: Plugin: SteamGridDB
summary: SteamGridDB is a Decky Loader plugin to add custom artwork to your games.

title: Set Up Moonlight Game Streaming on Steam Deck
summary: Want to play your high-end PC games on the Steam Deck without installing them locally?
